TopicTitle: Can the development route be added with inter cabin activities function？

Articles.Content: I mean that when you launch a rocket into space, you can control the activities of the little green man in the cabin！
I mean you can see little green man wants to play or eat something in cabin！

A couple of people showed the Kerbal inside the rocket. Sometimes it was accidental.   Basically it's just the idle animations you see in KSP 1 so far, but they really did not have time for more than that because only 3 hours and a bit to do everything, including break bad habits from KSP1 And figure out the differences
